text: This song is super similar to Popol Vuh - Aguirre I (L'acrime di rei).
author: Sami A

text:
Where do you find all of this game music to upload? I've finally worked my way though all of your VGM and some tracks are annoyingly difficult to find in mp3.

Keep up the excellent music uploads. I didn't have the breadth of game play you have and I've since stopped playing except for an hour or so a week, so I'm glad people such as yourself are still keeping the rest of us in the loop for what to listen for.

text: I've won Kirby Super Star Ultra (the one for the DS), and it's a pretty good game. I'm also near the end of Chrono Trigger, and I'm thinking about deleteing it and starting a new game because of some bad mistakes I made... author: NeatNit

text: A very atmospheric electronic overworld theme with a slow buildup. Great background music. The game had some flaws when it released but seemed to have a lot of potential. They released a couple patches to fix some of the issues so I'm not sure what the state of the game is right now. As a fan of post-apocalyptic settings, I might try it someday.
author: SupraDarky
